title: Abyssal Spider (Part 2)
body:
Abyssal Spider (Part 2)

Evan sat down on Albelu's back and followed after the blue spider.

All the fifty thousand spiders who were walking with the blue spider had tensed bodies, they were still afraid that the demon who was walking behind them would kill them at any moment.

Evan ordered Wyverns to fly ahead of spider army so that they would inform him if they found anything strange.

While the blue spider was leading the way, Evan opened his status window to take a look at it properly.Â 

(The synergy between you and skill 'BloodLust' has reached its peak)

(You have permanently acquired the Unique Skill 'BloodLust')

Evan first looked at the notifications that he received while fighting against Kazil, he noticed these notifications earlier when he opened his status window.
